title: To amend title XXI of the Social Security Act to permit the use of unexpended allotments under the State children's health care program for an additional fiscal year, and for other purposes.
content: Children First SCHIP Improvement Act of 2002 - Amends title XXI (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to provide for: (1) extending the availability through FY 2003 of SCHIP allotments for FY 1998 through 2000. And (2) SCHIP coverage of children whose family income exceeds the Medicaid applicable income level for eligible States.
